00010 void PriorityNode::init(void* agent)
00011 {
00012         currentPosition = -1;
00013         for (BehaviorTreeListIter iter = children.begin(); iter!= children.end(); iter++)
00014                 (*iter)->init(agent);

00018 BEHAVIOR_STATUS PriorityNode::execute(void* agent)
00019 {
00020         if (currentPosition != -1) //there's one still running
00021         {
00022                 BEHAVIOR_STATUS status = (children.at(currentPosition))->execute(agent);
00023                 if (status == BT_RUNNING)
00024                         return BT_RUNNING;
00025                 else if (status == BT_SUCCESS)
00026                 {
00027                         currentPosition = -1;
00028                         return BT_SUCCESS;
00029                 }
00030                 else if (status == BT_FAILURE)
00031                 {
00032                         currentPosition++;
00033                         if (currentPosition == children.size())
00034                         {
00035                                 currentPosition = -1;
00036                                 return BT_FAILURE;
00037                         }
00038                 }
00039         }
00040         else
00041         {
00042                 init(agent);
00043                 currentPosition = 0;
00044         }
00045         if (children.size() == 0)
00046                 return BT_SUCCESS;
00047 
00048         BehaviorTreeNode* currentlyRunningNode = children.at(currentPosition);
00049         BEHAVIOR_STATUS status;
00050         while ((status = (*currentlyRunningNode).execute(agent)) == BT_FAILURE) //keep trying children until one doesn't fail
00051         {
00052                 currentPosition++;
00053                 currentlyRunningNode = children.at(currentPosition);
00054                 if (currentPosition == children.size()) //all of the children failed
00055                 {
00056                         currentPosition = -1;
00057                         return BT_FAILURE;
00058                 }
00059         }
00060         return status;
00061 
00062 }
